description.@en: Covered in the blood and guts of another, you ready yourself from wicked butchery.

criticalFailure.@en: The knife takes on its own personality, dancing into the air as if guided by an apparition, for the spell’s Duration. For the Duration of the spell, roll a [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die at the start of your Turn. If the result is face ‘1’, it will lash out at you; if the result is face ‘2-5’, the knife does nothing; and if the result is face ‘6’, it will lash out at a random ally.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but victims cannot Dodge or Parry this attack.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the knife becomes ever-sharp and is treated as a one-handed melee weapon with the Vicious Quality. Instead of using your [CB], refer to your [WB] to determine Damage. Finally, whenever you strike or Parry with this knife, refer to your Incantation Skill instead of a Combat-based Skill. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick. After suffering an Injury, the foe must immediately Resist with a successful Toughness Test or begin to Bleed.

reagents.@en: Blood and feces from your own Ancestry, smeared onto a butcher’s knife (expended)
